sqlMap.select: SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT AAA.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.REPORT_NM reportNm , AA.REPORT_TITLE reportTitle , AA.REPORT_CONTENT reportContent , TO_CHAR(AA.REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reportDate , ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = AA.USER_ID ) reportWriter , ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM rNum FROM REPORT_BOARD A ) AA WHERE AA.REPORT_STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY 1 DESC ) AAA ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstRecNo# AND #lastRecNo#
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE REPORT_STATE = 'Y'

SELECT A.REPORT_NM reportNm , A.REPORT_TITLE reportTitle , A.REPORT_CONTENT reportContent , TO_CHAR(A.REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reportDate , ( SELECT USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) reportWriter , ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId FROM REPORT_BOARD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.REPORT_NM = #reportNm# AND A.REPORT_STATE = 'Y'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_BOARD ( REPORT_NM ,REPORT_TITLE ,REPORT_CONTENT ,REPORT_DATE ,USER_ID ,ATCH_FILE_ID ,REPORT_STATE ) VALUES ( REPORT_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #reportTitle# , #reportContent# , SYSDATE , #reportWriter# , #atchFileId# , 'Y' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REPORT_BOARD SET REPORT_TITLE = #reportTitle# ,REPORT_CONTENT = #reportContent# ,TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = SYSDATE ,ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId# WHERE REPORT_NM = #reportNm#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE REPORT_BOARD SET REPORT_STATE = 'N' WHERE REPORT_NM = #reportNm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT REPORT_NM reportNm , REPORT_TITLE reportTitle , REPORT_CONTENT reportContent , TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reportDate , USER_ID reportWriter FROM REPORT_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND REPORT_STATE = 'Y' AND REPORT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #reportTitle# || '%' OR ( SELECT B.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID ) LIKE '%' || #reportWriter# || '%'
